summary:
Want to be a Lich? Don't want to go through a lot of hassle to do so?
Well this is the mod for you.
descriptionHtml:
Lichdom Lite; for the Modern Necromancer.
---------

A small mod which adds:
1) The Phylactery. This item provides the "Undying Lich" ability. It can be crafted at any Cooking Pot using: an Attuned Black Soul Gem, two Tainted Herbs, and and one vial of Counterfeit Akaviri Poison.
2) Attuned Black Soul Gems. These are used solely for crafting the Phylactery. They can be crafted using either a filled or unfilled black soul gem and one Human Heart at a cooking pot.
3) Tainted Herbs. A more potent version of the Deathbell. Crafted using a regular Deathbell and one Falmer Blood Elixir.
4) Counterfeit Akaviri Poison. Craft it at any cooking pot with: One Dragonscale, one Nightshade, and one Imp Stool.
5) A crafting recipe for the Falmer Blood Elixir. It can now be crafted at any cooking pot using two Falmer Ears.
6) Three spell tomes. These can be crafted at any Tanning Rack, with one Human Heart, and one Paper Roll.
7) Three new spells, learnt from the new spell tomes. They are: Soul Steal, Summon Subjugated Spirit, and Necromantic Thrall.
8) A decorative version of the Phylactery. Serves no other purpose.
